description: Dashboard for Kubernetes cluster with Prometheus.

targets.expr:
sum(kube_pod_info * on (node) group_left (role) kube_node_labels{cluster=~"$cluster",label_group=~"$label_group"}) /
sum(kube_node_status_allocatable_pods * on (node) group_left (role) kube_node_labels{cluster=~"$cluster",label_group=~"$label_group"}) * 100

title: Kubernetes Cluster - Prometheus
